content:
in Hanover N.H. the Eagles rolled to straightset victories over Lafayette Siena and Dartmouth improving to a perfect  record on the year surpassing the programs win total for each of the past two seasons PERIOD

With six wins in six tries the Eagles will look to pick up their third consecutive weekend sweep as they head to New Hampshire and play at the Dartmouth Invitational PERIOD
